string-array.name: load_phrases
string-array.item: the architects are still drafting
the bits are breeding
we are building the buildings as fast as we can
would you prefer chicken, steak, or tofu?
pay no attention to the man behind the curtain
and enjoy the elevator music
while the little elves draw your map
a few bits tried to escape, but we caught them
and dream of faster computers
would you like fries with that?
checking the gravitational constant in your locale
go ahead - hold your breath
at least you are not on hold
hum something loud while others stare
you are not in Kansas any more
the server is powered by a lemon and two electrodes
we love you just the way you are
while a larger software vendor in Seattle takes over the world
don not think of purple hippos
follow the white rabbit
why dont you order a sandwich?
while the satellite moves into position
the bits are flowing slowly today
dig on the X for buried treasure.. ARRR!
it is still faster than you could draw it
